htmlform.formName: HMIS 082a - Exposed Infant Card Encounter Form
htmlform.formDescription: Captures encounter details for infants born to HIV positive mothers

obs.answerLabels: EBF: Exclusive Breastfeeding,RF: Replacement Feeding (never breastfed),MF: Mixed Feeding (below 6 months),CF: Complimentary Breast Feeding (above 6 months),W: Wean from breastfeeding,NLB: No Longer Breastfeeding
Red <11.5cm and/or Oedema Present,Yellow 11.5 -<12.5cm and Oedema Absent,Green >=12.5cm and Oedema Absent

tr.td:
Clinical Assessment for Signs &
Symptoms of HIV

obs.answerLabel: WELL: NO clinical signs or symptoms

tr.td: Developmental Assesment for Evidance of Delay

obs.answerLabels: TOB: Transfering objects from hand to hand

tr.td: ACTION(S) TAKEN if any care indicator are a concern
